transcript:
Customer: Haan sir boliye.
Executive: Haan woh mam actually leads vagaira kaafi time se consumption bilkul nahi ho raha tha. 
To abhi main wahi monthly basis pe kya hai ki main sari cheeze jo hai report vagaira dekh raha tha. 
To isme isme mam call response rate to achcha hai 85% ke around. 
Lekin leads vagaira hum log kyu nahi mam consume kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sir network issue ki wajah se mobile bhi mobile par app chalaye na to mobile na hang ho raha hai bar bar aur network issue ki wajah se nahi ho pa raha hai. Fir bhi main jaise call aati aate hain na waise receive kar leti hu.
Executive: Mam call to aap kar lete ho lekin lead to mam waste ja raha hai na. 
Aur fir aap bhi jante ho ki aapke owner jo hai woh gussa bhi karenge fir baad mein. 
To hum pe bhi gussa hum pe bhi karenge mam aap pe bhi gussa karenge kyuki unhone matlab matlab unhone to yahi bola tha na ki aap mam se boliye leads vagaira unko consume karaiye.
Customer: Haan haan sir. 
Executive: Hai na lekin ab mam aap call nahi agar man lijiye answer karenge to fir leads kaise consume hogi?
Customer: Main na kuch din bahar gaav thi is mobile mere paas tha to waha na network ka problem tha to jaise net aata tha waise main karne ki koshish karti thi par tab tak woh lead bhi chali jati thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm lekin mam abhi jaise kya hai na aapne aakhri bar jo lead consume kari thi woh September mein kiya tha.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Abhi abhi jaise kya hai November mein hum chal raha hai. 
Hai na to abhi aaj 13 November hai 13th November aur last hum logo ne jo lead consume kiya tha woh main exact date aapko bata de raha hu.


Ek second mam.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: 24 September ko mam ke consume kiya gaya tha 24 September ko.
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: And ab ye samjhiye mam 24 September ke baad aaj lead ek lead aap consume hui hai aur woh shayad sir ne kari hai aaj ki date mein ek lead.
Customer: Nahi sir maine ki hai woh. 
Executive: Achcha aapne kiya hai achcha. 
Haan. 
Executive: Theek hai abhi total teen ho gayi hai jaise abhi consume aur. 
Customer: Hmm ek Buldhana ki hai Akot ki hai Yavatmal.
Executive: Ji to mam thoda sa matlab hame dekhna padega ye cheez ki agar hum log lead nahi consume karenge to fir hamara visibility dheere dheere bahut down ho jayega.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Haan to ye cheez mam thoda sa hame dhyan dena hai. Hamare jo Yavatmal hai, Buldhana hai, Hingoli hai, Akola hai to ye jo bhi hamare cities hain preferred jahan pe bhi hum log business karte hain hai na kyuki area bhi hamara limited hai hum log matlab Maharashtra ke kuch hi cities mein deal karte hain. 
To at least hum log hum log in cities ka leads to consume kare na kam se kam.
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: Hai na to ye cheez ye cheez jo hai mam kariye aap consume regular basis pe aur uske alawa jo direct inquiry aati hai woh inquiry sirf call wali nahi baat kar raha hu main call wali to aapko man lijiye aap call utha liya jaise general call utha liya. 
Customer: Lead manager mein jo aati hai woh. 
Executive: Haan haan lead manager pe ek inquiry aayi thi mam Vaibhav Ghatol naam se ye customer CLC block ka requirement hai inka 5000 piece ka achcha order tha mam ye 9 tarikh ka hai ab samajh lijiye aaj chautha din hai. 
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: Ek bar inse ek bar inse baat kariye mam dekhiye requirement samajhiye local Akola ke hi customer hai easily order bhi deliver ho sakta hai.
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: Haan aap lead manager khola hai aapne?
Customer: Haan sir ek Abdul bhi Abdul 7 November ko aaya hai. 
Executive: Aath Haan app to chal raha hai na aapka?
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai. 
Haan ye wala dekhiye 9 9 tarikh ki date mein dekhiye. 
Customer: Haan Bhavani electronics haan sir. 
Executive: Vaibhav wala dekhiye mam 9 tarikh ka jo hai. 
Customer: Haan haan haan. 
Executive: Theek hai ye dekhiye bada order hai mam 5000 piece ka order hai around 2.5-3 lakh ka order hai ye.
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: Theek hai to isme mam reply kar dijiye aap thanks for your inquiry karke aur uske alawa ek message aap dal dijiye time to connect ya fir catalog ka link hi bhej dijiye inko kam se kam.
Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Ji mam. 
Customer: Haan sir aawaz. 
Executive: Aawaz aa raha hai mam mera? 
Customer: Haan haan abhi aa raha hai. 
Executive: Haan main keh raha hu mam ki inko reply kar dijiye lead manager se. 
Customer: Kiya na sir. 
Executive: Kar diya aapne theek hai aur baki ke baki ke mam dusre customers bhi jo aapke nearby area ke hain unko bhi lead manager se reply karna hai. 
Customer: Theek hai sir. 
Executive: Theek hai abhi dekhiye mam maine aapko ek link bheja hai usse connect kariyega. 
Customer: WhatsApp par? 
Executive: Haan ji haan ji mam.


Customer: Haan sir. 
Link nahi hai sir ye. 
Executive: Mam lead. 
Executive: Nahi nahi mam aaj ki date mein mam dekhiye aaj ki date mein. 
Customer: Aap abhi send kar rahe hain sir. 
Executive: Dekhiye abhi fir se maine bhej diya isko. 
Customer: Sir link link nahi open ho rahi. 
Executive: Mam number save nahi hai kya aapka mere phone matlab mera number aapke phone mein? 
Customer: Nahi sir ek minute main abhi save kar leti hu. 
Executive: Haan mam kyuki number save nahi hota hai na to link nahi show karta koi bhi agar aata hai to. 
Number aap Sunil ke naam se save kar lijiye ya IndiaMART account manager ke naam se save kar lijiye. 
Customer: Sunil sir karke save kiya. 
Executive: Theek hai mam. 
Customer: Hmm hmm. 
Executive: Ab aa gaya hoga. 
Customer: Haan link to open kar li. 
Executive: Call sir mujhe call cut karna padega. 
Executive: Haan koi dikkat nahi cut kar dijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not consumed for a long time.

- Mobile hangs due to network issues.

- Visibility will decrease if leads not consumed.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of lead consumption.

- Executive shared details of pending inquiry.

- Executive shared a link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will reply to leads from lead manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, consumption, network, visibility, inquiry
